# Thomas Fratto — Baseball Prospect
> Junior Infield prospect at Eckerd College (Sunshine State Conference). Left-handed hitter, 6'0", 205 lbs. Available for transfer.

## Primary Profile
- [Official Website](https://tfrattobaseball.com): Central hub for scouting film, metrics, and transfer status.
- [Eckerd Roster Page](https://eckerdtritons.com/sports/baseball/roster/thomas-fratto/5664): Official collegiate bio and verified game statistics.

## Career Statistics

### 2024-2025 — Northern Essex Community College (NECC)
- [NECC Player Profile](https://neccknights.com/sports/bsb/2023-24/players/thomasfratto9mnn)
- **AVG:** .295 | **OBP:** .452 | **SLG:** .527 | **OPS:** .979
- **G:** 41 | **AB:** 129 | **H:** 38 | **R:** 36 | **RBI:** 37
- **HR:** 6 | **2B:** 8 | **3B:** 2 | **BB:** 34 | **SB:** 15

- **Position:** Infield (1B)
- **Bats/Throws:** L / R
- **Height/Weight:** 6'0" / 205 lbs

- **Academics:** Eckerd College (NCAA DII)
